title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 14.2 - Audit of refunds by comptroller
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 14.2 - Audit of refunds by comptroller

State Regulations
A refund from any fund in which the State has an interest, direct or indirect, in the whole or any part thereof, comes within the scope of
the Comptroller's audit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
14.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
